title: Hank Cavalry: Confession #3
description: Some Hollywood secrets are guarded so closely that they’ll never appear in print.When a famous guest professor takes the stage at the local actor’s classroom early one morning, every would-be actress in attendance sat up eagerly to listen; all except the one who had fallen fast asleep in her chair. A bout of insomnia finds Liz waking up in class, only to be corrected by the man of steel himself, Hank Cavalry.The third confession of E.C. Towers' Starfucker: Erotic Shorts Series tells the story of how an unexpected classroom exercise leads a budding actress on the erotic adventure of her dreams.
author: E.C. Towers
